question: I _________ to the gym every day before work.
She _________ in this company since 2010.
The meeting _________ until next week due to unforeseen circumstances.
You _________ start your assignment as soon as possible.
If I _________ more time, I would have completed the project.
He asked me _________ I could help him with his project.
She _________ me she would be late for the meeting.
Please let me know _________ you have any questions.
The new manager _________ a positive impact on the team morale.
I haven't seen him _________ we finished college.
This report is _________ important than the previous one.
The company's profits _________ significantly last quarter.
He is the _________ candidate for the position.
The project was completed _________ time and under budget.
The conference will take place _________ two weeks.
We need to _________ our efforts to meet the deadline.
The CEO announced a _________ initiative to improve customer service.
The team _________ in the office until late last night.
Please make sure to _________ the report before submitting it.
They _________ a new product line next month.
The company's stock price _________ steadily over the past year.
He _________ for the job three times before he finally got it.
I will be away from the office _________ next Monday.
The team _________ working on the project as soon as possible.
She _________ the manager for a raise, but he refused.
We will have to _________ the meeting until next week.
Please make sure to _________ the door when you leave.
We _________ the project on time if we work together.
The report _________ to the client by the end of the week.
The company _________ a new marketing campaign next month.
I have _________ many job interviews this month.
